## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmcond">AsmCond</a> - Class to support conditional assembly.

The conditional assembly feature (.if, .else, .elseif and .endif) is implemented with <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmcond">AsmCond</a> that tells us what we are in the middle of processing. Ignore can be either true or false. When true we are ignoring the block of code in the middle of a conditional.

Definition at line 21 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/include/llvm/mc/mcparser/asmcond-h">AsmCond.h</a>.
